name: Trolley (Instrument or Medication)
specifications: Stainless steel or coated metal; 2–3 shelves; locking caster wheels; handles; standard height 80–100 cm.
function: Used for transporting medical instruments, medications, or supplies within clinical or simulation areas.
usage: Load items securely; push trolley using handles; keep pathway clear; lock wheels when stationary to prevent movement.
maintenance: Clean shelves and handles regularly; check wheel function and brakes.
warning: Overloading shelves or leaving wheels unlocked during transfer.
